alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns and central Clay Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middleburg, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Middleburg, Fleming Island, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
